viewDescription: Customize the appearance and visual preferences of the application.
languageDescription: Select your preferred language for the user interface.
aiDescription: Configure the AI provider, model, and API tokens used by the JavaScript console. AI calls become available once a provider, model, and token are saved.
aiTokenHelperUnset: No API token stored yet. Enter a token to enable AI.
aiTokenHelperSet: Token stored securely. Leave this field empty to keep the existing token.
aiToggleDescription: When disabled, AI features and /ai commands are unavailable.
aiValidateNeedToken: Enter an API token before validating.
aiModelRequiresValidation: Validate your token to load models
aboutDescription: NodeRef helps you understand your repository faster. You can jump between nodes, easy search queries, and scripts without losing time in the UI. It's made for people who work with Alfresco every day.
appDescription: The desktop tool Alfresco always needed.
ootbeeDescription: This application makes use of the open source module OOTBee Support Tools, which extends the set of administrative tools on the Repository and Share tier.
ootbeeGratitude: We are grateful to the authors of OOTBee Support Tools for their contribution.
reauthDescription: Your session for {{serverName}} has expired. Please sign in again to continue.
reauthInstructions: Click 'Sign in Again' to open the login window and re-authenticate with your OIDC provider.
reauthSuccessMessage: Authentication successful! Your session has been refreshed.
